name: classes
description: Classes to add to the service navigation container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example, data attributes) to add to the service navigation container.

name: ariaLabel
description: The text for the `aria-label` which labels the service navigation container when a service name is included. Defaults to `"Service information"`.

name: menuButtonText
description: The text of the mobile navigation menu toggle.

name: menuButtonLabel
description: The screen reader label for the mobile navigation menu toggle. Defaults to the same value as `menuButtonText` if not specified.

name: navigationLabel
description: The screen reader label for the mobile navigation menu. Defaults to the same value as `menuButtonText` if not specified.

name: navigationId
description: The ID used to associate the mobile navigation toggle with the navigation menu. Defaults to `navigation`.

name: navigationClasses
description: Classes to add to the navigation menu container.

name: navigation
description: Used to add navigation to the service header.

params.name: current
params.description: If `true`, indicates that the user is currently on this page. This takes precedence over `active`.

params.name: active
params.description: If `true`, indicates that the user is within this group of pages in the navigation hierarchy.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: text
params.description: Text for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: href
params.description: URL of the navigation item anchor.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the navigation item anchor.

name: slots
description: Specified points for injecting custom HTML into the service header.

params.name: start
params.description: HTML injected at the start of the service header container.

params.name: end
params.description: HTML injected at the end of the service header container.

params.name: navigationStart
params.description: HTML injected before the first list item in the navigation list. Requires `navigation` to be set.

params.name: navigationEnd
params.description: HTML injected after the last list item in the navigation list. Requires `navigation` to be set.
